TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 属性类提供了以下功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性返回的格式设置以在中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 属性返回的模板的关联的模板组集合。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated . - 属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器将创建关联的临时副本来生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记在设计时。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 时调用方法关联的数据源的架构更改。The method is called when the schema of the data source for the associated changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类更改派生自的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyFormView`控件从控件。The example derives the `MyFormView` control from the control. `MyFormView`只是一个副本的。The `MyFormView` is simply a copy of the . 该示例还从`MyFormViewDesigner`类并放置对象`MyFormViewDesigner`上`MyFormView`控件。The example also derives the `MyFormViewDesigner` class from the and places a object for the `MyFormViewDesigner` on the `MyFormView` control. `MyFormViewDesigner`重写以下各项：The `MyFormViewDesigner` overrides the following items: - 属性指定的页导航行的设计时视图的`MyFormView`包含四个页面链接。The property to specify that the pager row for the design-time view of the `MyFormView` contain four page links. - 方法以包括属性，如果它指定的为新的第一行`MyFormView`网格在设计时。The method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyFormView` grid at design time. 如果属性`MyFormView`是或值，绘制的控件，以使其范围更明显周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the `MyFormView` is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类时创建关联控件或一份设计图面上的控件。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of the control on the design surface.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象填充从 XML 编码的内部类的成员。The object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已定义的项模板控件，方法设置对空在控件集合数组如果无法获取数据源的架构。If an item template has been defined for the control, the method sets the collection of the control to an empty array if the schema for the data source cannot be obtained. 刷新对象以强制对的调用方法。The refreshes the object to force a call to the method. 然后调用基方法，以生成标记。The then calls the base method to generate the markup. 如果没有项模板已定义的控件，调用方法来生成呈现到占位符的标记。If no item template has been defined for the control, the calls the method to generate markup that renders to a placeholder. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类更改的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 该示例将新的第一行添加到要包含的网格属性，如果定义。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果派生自的控件属性是或值，绘制的控件，以使其范围更明显周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the control that is derived from the is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 该示例不会更改控件的运行时外观。The example does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果你重写方法，一定要调用基方法，因为它最终，经过多级重写时，调用上控件或一份控件来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件占位符的标记文本。

span.span: Gets the markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含在设计图面上呈现到占位符的标记文本。

span.span: A containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标记控件不包括项目模板之一方法调用方法，为包含有关如何编辑模板内容和一条消息说明的占位符生成标记项模板是必需的。If the markup for the control does not include one of the item templates, the method calls the method, which generates the markup for a placeholder that contains instructions on how to edit template content and a message that an item template is required.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主调用方法准备设计器用于呈现时控件。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 其基方法配置属性，并连接到所需的设计器操作的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是与此设计器或一份相关联的控件控件。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源架构更改时，将调用它。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非设计器处于编辑模式或字段的模板是正在添加或编辑，方法调用方法，后者反过来调用方法来更新控件以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

span.span: The properties for the class of the component.

summary.span: 设计时在设计宿主的属性网格中添加或移除属性，或提供可能与关联控件上的属性相对应的新设计时属性。

span.span: Adds or removes properties in the properties grid in a design host at design time, or provides new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指定 控件是否使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则。

span.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: 如果该控件使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用的外部表容器来应用标记中的内联样式规则。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 你可以通过将此属性设置为删除外部表容器`true`。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`. 这提供了在将应用 CSS 样式规则中的控件标记的灵活性。This provides flexibility in applying CSS style rules in the control markup.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取要显示的关联控件的示例行数。

span.span: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终返回`2`。The always returns `2`. 这将导致两个页面链接的页导航行中显示控制在设计时，如果模式是数值。This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the control at design time, if the mode is numeric. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写从继承类中的属性类更改的页导航行中显示的页链接数控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the property in a class that is inherited from the class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the control at design time. 此示例将导致显示四个页面链接。The example causes four page links to display. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/CS/formviewdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner/VB/formviewdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中为 中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造的集合对象，一个关联的每个控件模板控件。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each control template in the associated control. 控件模板是页眉、 页脚、 页导航、 项、 编辑项、 插入项和空数据。The control templates are the header, footer, pager, item, edit item, insert item, and empty data. 控件模板元素包含单个对象。The control template elements contain a single object.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终为 true 时，该设计器使用包含一份关联的控件控件来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always true, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制不影响任何持久性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果属性已被重写以返回`false`，设计器将使用关联本身来生成设计时标记。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或者想要确定基于是否将控件标记具有类级别其值对象。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level object.

para.span: 如果不重写，控件将忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the control ignores the .
